    • Method Detail

      • payCost

        public void payCost​(java.util.List<AmmoColor> cost,
                    Player player,
                    RemotePlayer remotePlayer)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Pay a certain cost, you MUST verify that the player can pay che cost using the canPay method, otherwise this won't work. Firstly pays with the available ammo, then uses the powerups, if needed
        Parameters:
        cost - The cost to be payed
        player - The player that has to pay
        remotePlayer - The RemotePlayer object that refers to the player
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - thrown when the player can't pay the cost
